Constructor Detail

TRE

public TRE(java.lang.String tag)
    throws NITFException
Creates a new TRE of the given type. The tag is the TRE tag (such as "JITCID"). This uses the default id for the given TRE. In some cases, the plug-in may not be able to find the TRE, or it may not be able to decide which TREDescription to use by default. In those cases, a NITFException will be thrown.

Parameters:
tag - the type of TRE to create
id - the id of the TRE Description to use, or null to use the default
Throws:
NITFException - if tag is an unkown type, or if the default description can not be identified

TRE

public TRE(java.lang.String tag,
           java.lang.String id)
    throws NITFException
Creates a new TRE of the given type. The tag is the TRE tag (such as "JITCID"). The id is the identifier of the TREDescription. Each TREDescription has its own identifier pertaining to a specific revision, etc. Many TREs will not have a revision, so you can leave the id null.

Parameters:
tag - the type of TRE to create
id - the id of the TRE Description to use, or null to use the default
Throws:
NITFException - if tag is an unkown type

exists

public boolean exists(java.lang.String tag)
Returns true if the given field tag exists within the TRE The tag is the identifier for the field. Check out the TRE Descriptions for a listing of the field tags for each TRE. Note - Fields that loop will have a tag TAG[i], such that i is the number in the loop, starting with 0

Parameters:
tag - the identifier for the field
Returns:
true if the field exists, false otherwise

find

public java.util.List<TRE.FieldPair> find(java.lang.String pattern)
                                   throws NITFException
Returns a List of Fields that match the given pattern. TODO : more documentation here

Parameters:
pattern - the pattern to match
Returns:
Fields that match the pattern
Throws:
NITFException - if an error occurs or no field with with the given tag exists

getField

               throws NITFException

Parameters:

Returns:
the Field, if found, or null if not found
Throws:
NITFException - if an error occurs

setField

public boolean setField(java.lang.String tag,
                        byte[] data)
                 throws NITFException
Attempts to set the value of the field referenced by tag to the data given. Throws a NITFException if an error occurs.

Parameters:
tag - the identifier for the field
data - the data to use
Throws:
NITFException - if an error occurs

iterator

public java.util.Iterator<TRE.FieldPair> iterator()
Retrieve an Iterator for FieldPairs. This will iterate through all of the fields in the TRE, returning a FieldPair for each.

Returns:
Iterator of FieldPairs
